goals__remit: Intuit's mission is to power prosperity around the world, focusing on individuals, small businesses and the self-employed. We serve over 42 million customers in North America, Europe, Australia and beyond with an ecosystem of innovative financial management tools, including QuickBooks and QuickBooks Self Employed.  These tools help people track and manage their finances, comply with government regulations, and make smart financial decisions that can help them put more money in their pocket and reduce the time needed for "back-office" work, so they can do more of what they love.
